body.name: Elite Gourmet ECT5322 Long Slot 4 Slice Toaster, Countdown Timer, Bagel Function 6 Toast Setting, Defrost, Cancel Function, Built-in Warming Rack, Extra Wide Slots for Bagels Waffles, Stainless Steel
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 37 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 37 mins
features: 2 EXTRA WIDE 1.25" TOASTING SLOTS to fit up to 4 extra thick slices of bread products such as Texas Toast, bagels and specialty breads.
CAPACITIVE TOUCH SCREEN WITH DEFROST & BAGEL FUNCTIONS allow you to easily defrost and toast breads quickly and conveniently toast Bagels on the inside while leaving the outside warm & soft.
COUNTDOWN TIMER with 6 adjustable toasting levels and LED display to select the perfect browning shade for your bread from slightly warm to dark and crunchy.
RETRACTABLE WARMING RACK for warming pastries, croissants, buns, rolls, pitas and more.
REHEAT WARMING FUNCTION allows you to easily reheat and warm previously toasted breads quickly at a lower temperature without burning.
CONVENIENT CANCEL BUTTON lets you quickly cancel and release the toast in the middle of the toasting cycle.
SLIDE OUT CRUMB TRAY & CORD STORAGE for quick and easy cleanup of crumbs and debris & no unsightly cords.

TRUSTED BRAND: As a trusted brand for 40 years, Elite Gourmet has developed and delivered high quality, stylish, multi-functional kitchen products that are affordable & user friendly. Call, email, or live chat with us, our US-based support team responds quickly to all questions and requests.
body.description: Introducing the Elite Gourmet long slot toaster, designed to accommodate extra wide and long slices of bread with its 4-slice capacity and sleek design. The Capacitive Touch Screen makes selecting your desired function and toast shades easy. There are 6 variable browning shades easy so you can select the perfect level of doneness for your toast, from light to dark. We’ve included a defrost function to quickly thaw frozen slices of bread, a bagel function to toast the inside of sliced bagels while keeping the outside warm and soft, and a retractable warming rack for delicious pastries. The LED digital count-down timer automatically adjusts toasting time, ensuring perfectly toasted bread every time. Say goodbye to burnt or underdone toast and hello to hassle-free mornings. Enjoy the convenience and ease of toasting and warming your favorite foods for breakfast, lunch, or a quick snack. Don't miss out on this must-have addition to your kitchen. Buy now and experience the best toast of your life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves a lot of space
reviews.reviewText: This fits our space perfectly. Needed something that didn't sit so far out onto our counter. This is very compact and sits sideways so not a lot of wasted space. Does a great job toasting the bread. Even heat distribution. I love the digital read out and timer so I can see when it will be done. Only complaint would be that both sides go down so not like normal 4 slice toaster where you just do one side. But it is much more efficient on toasting. Warming option is great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Toast and bagels fit perfect. Toasts great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice product but does not get both sides bread evenly toasted.
reviews.reviewText: The toaster has a nice look, the digital time remaining readout is nice. I needed a toaster that I could place horizontally on the counter, so having the controls on the side instead of the end was very helpful. I have to subtract a star because the toaster does not toast the bread evenly on both sides. It isn't enough of a difference to warrant returning the item. It is about one level different (i.e., one side will look like the darkness level set and the other side will be 1 level lighter). The defrost setting works when taking a new loaf out of the freezer and immediately putting a slice in the toaster. I haven't tested the bagel setting. The long slots work well for slices of sour dough rounds and rye breads that have wider slices. For the price, it serves its purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow this is a great toaster !
reviews.reviewText: I have never been excited over a toaster before , but this one is easy to use and clean looks very nice in my kitchen.Very good quality and works better than any toaster I have ever had before. I cant recommend this enough and you will have good toast, bagels ect.You can use the time control to adjust to your desired level of toastyness :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great quality toaster. I wanted to use it for a while before I did a review. It is longer and wider than I expected but I have now learned to love that about it and love all the features. I also love that if you have large specialty size bread slices that they can fit with no issues. The slots are very long and wide with no divider in each slot. Bagels fit with no issues. You can put 4 bagels halves or 4 regular pieces of toast in at one time or just 2 at a time. The timer on the side helps also with my impatience as I know what to expect since it shows how much time is left. It does not put out any heat on the sides but does put out quite a bit from the top. Not enough to be concerned unless I had something in there a long time. I do have it on my counter which sits under my upper cabinet next to my microwave and if I were to need something to be in there longer I would just pull it away from my upper cabinet so it would not be directly below it. The cord is a good length. I have not used the metal holders for anything yet to reheat or keep it warm so I cannot say how it works but I am sure it would work great with the heat it puts out. I do have a smaller kitchen and storage space is limited so I can't put it away anywhere plus I don't like getting crumbs in my cabinets. So, I leave it on the counter. It does take up quite a bit of space but I use it a lot, so it works out for me. The 2 main reasons I got it was the timer and the size of the slots so I can deal with the size of the whole toaster because I love the size of the slots. It also had good reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NIce toaster, but....
reviews.reviewText: This toaster has two large slots that can accomodate slices of homemade bread. The digital controls are a bit difficult to understand at first but after a few uses it's okay.It seems to toast the bread unevenly though. One side of the bread will always be cooked more than the other.When I make toast I move the toaster out so it is not directly under the cabinets. That much heat is not good for the cabinet above the toaster. The tray that holds the crumbs does not work very well. I have to clean the counter surface under the toaster to pickup all the crumbs that fall out the bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Adjustable toast settings. Warmer works great. Does a great job on bagels. I love the pill out tray to get rid of all the crumbs. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beware. Did not work out of the box.
reviews.reviewText: Read the manual and then plugged the toaster in. It did not turn on. LED did not display. So either this company makes terrible products or it has a terrible product review system or Amazon sent to me a toaster that had been returned because it didn't work. Whatever the reason, I will return for money back rather than a replacement because I do not have faith in the fact it didn't turn on at all, and I don't want the inconvenience of having to re-package and drive to a UPS store to return another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Chose this as it had exactly the same body as my current toaster, but a different brand. Was very disappointed I had to return it as it had the wrong plug on the end for the UK. I bought an adapter, then discovered the toaster has the WRONG VOLTAGE too, being only 120v . Why is it available here, when it won't function here. It nearly blew up when I plugged it in!
Toasts plus grillé d'un côté, vers le centre du grille pain, que de l'autre.

Well packaged, arrived in perfect condition! Toaster slots are longer and wider to accommodate bigger slices of bread. Attractive appliance! Light and easy to store!Even turning the toast adjustment to the highest level doesn’t do the job, always have to put the toast down twice. Some of the heating element wires don’t seem to get hot or at least hot enough to be red in colour. The countdown clock is kinda hokey! I don’t think I’d buy this toaster again given its performance!
No bagel setting but put just a bit about the 3 setting….perfectToast bread evenly and quickly
